descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This high-quality chair is perfect for gamers and office workers alike. It offers superior comfort and a stylish design in a vibrant purple color.

Crafted with premium soft PU leather and featuring hand-sewing diamond cross stitching, this chair not only looks great but also provides long-lasting durability. The integrated metal frame ensures stability and support for extended use.

The Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is packed with amazing features to enhance your gaming or work experience. The lumbar pillow, powered by USB, offers a soothing massage function for ultimate relaxation. The chair can also be reclined from 90° to 155°, allowing you to find the perfect angle for your comfort. The 360° swivel feature enables effortless movement, while the 15° rocking capability adds a fun element to your seating experience.

The adjustable armrests can be moved up, down, right, and left, providing customized support for your arms. Made from soft PU leather, they ensure a comfortable resting place for your arms during intense gaming or work sessions.

Safety and stability are of utmost importance, which is why the chair is equipped with a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase, tested for durability over 2000 miles. The thickened explosion-proof chassis adds an extra layer of protection and peace of mind.

The tilt mechanism allows you to adjust the chair angle within a range of 90° to 155°, and it features a safety lock to keep the chair in place once you find your desired position. The gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certified, ensuring reliable performance and longevity.

With a weight capacity of 330lbs, this chair can accommodate users of various sizes. It also comes with a comprehensive warranty, including a one-month free return policy and 5 years of parts replacement.

The seat cushion is designed with a thickness of 4.3 inches and made from high-density shaped foam, providing excellent support and comfort. It is also resilient and breathable, ensuring a pleasant seating experience even during long gaming or work sessions.

The ergonomic support features a detachable and adjustable headrest and an adjustable lumbar support pillow, allowing you to customize the chair to fit your unique needs.

The Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is suitable for both gaming and office use, making it a versatile choice for any environment. It is also easy to assemble, with pre-assembled screws and clear instructions included.

We prioritize your satisfaction, which is why our customer service is available 24/7 to assist you with any inquiries or concerns. We are committed to providing you with an exceptional customer experience.

Upgrade your gaming or work setup with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Order now and enjoy the ultimate combination of style, comfort, and functionality!

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This high-quality chair is perfect for gamers and office workers alike. 

The chair comes in a sleek Purple color and is made from premium soft PU leather, ensuring both comfort and durability. The hand-sewing diamond cross stitching adds a touch of elegance to the design. 

One of the standout features of this chair is the lumbar pillow, which is USB-powered and equipped with a massage function for ultimate relaxation. Additionally, the chair can be reclined from 90° to 155°, allowing you to find your preferred seating position. 

The chair also offers a 360° swivel, height adjustability, and a rocking feature of up to 15°. The armrests are adjustable both vertically and horizontally, providing customizable support. They are covered with soft PU leather for added comfort. 

The frame of the chair is made from integrated metal, ensuring stability and durability. The wheelbase is a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover design, which has been tested for 2000 miles of rolling. The chassis is thickened and explosion-proof for added safety. 

The tilt mechanism of the chair is adjustable, with an angle range of 90° to 155°. It also features a safety lock to keep you secure while reclining. The gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certified, guaranteeing its quality and reliability. 

With a weight capacity of 330lbs, this chair can accommodate users of various sizes. It also comes with a warranty that includes a one-month free return policy and five years of parts replacement coverage. 

The seat cushion is made from high-density shaped foam, providing excellent support and comfort. It has a thickness of 4.3 inches and features great resilience and breathability. 

Ergonomics are a priority with this chair, as it includes a retractable footrest, a detachable and adjustable headrest, and an adjustable lumbar support pillow. 

This chair is suitable for both gaming and office use, making it a versatile addition to any space. 

Assembly is a breeze with this chair, as it is easy to assemble and comes with pre-assembled screws. 

We also take pride in our customer service, offering 24/7 support to ensure your satisfaction with our product. 

Upgrade your gaming or office experience with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Order yours today and experience the ultimate in comfort and support!

Product Listing:

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This high-quality chair is perfect for both gaming and office use. With its luxurious purple color and premium soft PU leather material, it offers both comfort and style.

The hand-sewing diamond cross stitching adds an elegant touch to the chair, making it a standout piece in any room. The chair comes with a USB-powered lumbar pillow that provides a soothing massage function, perfect for relaxing during long gaming sessions or work hours.

The chair features a wide reclining range, from 90° to 155°, allowing you to find the perfect angle for maximum comfort. It also offers a 360° swivel, making it easy to move around and reach different areas of your workspace.

For added convenience, the chair is height adjustable, allowing you to customize it according to your preference. The rocking feature, with a 15° range, adds an extra element of relaxation to your seating experience.

The adjustable armrests, both vertically and horizontally, provide optimal support for your arms and can be easily positioned to suit your needs. They are made of soft PU leather for added comfort.

The integrated metal frame ensures stability and durability, while the 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase, tested for 2000 miles, guarantees smooth and safe movement. The thickened explosion-proof chassis adds an extra layer of safety.

The tilt mechanism allows you to adjust the chair angle within the range of 90° to 155° and comes with a safety lock for added security. The gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certificated, ensuring its quality and performance.

With a weight capacity of 330lb, this chair is designed to accommodate users of various sizes and weights. It also comes with a warranty that includes a one-month free return policy and 5 years of parts replacement.

The seat cushion, made of high-density shaped foam, is 4.3 inches thick and provides excellent support and comfort. Its features include great resilience and breathability, ensuring a comfortable sitting experience.

The chair is ergonomically designed with a retractable footrest, adjustable and detachable headrest, and adjustable lumbar support pillow. These features allow you to customize the chair to fit your body shape and provide optimal support for your neck, back, and legs.

Assembly is easy, and the chair comes with pre-assembled screws for your convenience. The customer service is available 24/7, ensuring that your queries and concerns are addressed promptly.

Upgrade your gaming or office setup with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Experience ultimate comfort, support, and style while enjoying your favorite activities. Order now and take your seating experience to the next level!

**Product Listing: Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair**

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair, a perfect addition to your gaming or office setup. This chair offers ultimate comfort and support, allowing you to immerse yourself in your favorite games or work for hours on end.

**Features:**

- **Color:** Purple
- **Material:** Premium soft PU leather for a luxurious feel
- **Stitching:** Hand-sewing diamond cross stitching for added durability and style
- **Lumbar Pillow:** Equipped with a USB-powered massage function for ultimate relaxation
- **Reclining:** Easily adjust the chair angle from 90° to 155° for personalized comfort
- **Swivel:** Enjoy a full 360° range of motion for easy maneuverability
- **Height Adjustable:** Customize the chair height to your preference
- **Rocking:** Experience gentle rocking motion up to 15° for added comfort
- **Armrests:** Adjustable armrests allow for vertical and horizontal positioning, while the soft PU leather coating ensures a comfortable resting place for your arms

- **Wheelbase:** 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover design with rolling tests up to 2000 miles
- **Chassis:** Thickened explosion-proof chassis for enhanced safety
- **Tilt Mechanism:** Adjustable angle range from 90° to 155° with a safety lock feature
- **Gas Cylinder:** SGS and BIFMA certified for durability and reliability
- **Weight Capacity:** Supports up to 330lb
- **Warranty:** Enjoy a one-month free return policy and a 5-year parts replacement warranty
- **Seat Cushion:** Features a 4.3-inch thickness of high density shaped foam for optimal comfort
- **Ergonomics:** Retractable footrest for added relaxation, detachable and adjustable headrest, and adjustable lumbar support for personalized comfort
- **Suitability:** Perfect for gaming and office use
- **Assembly:** Easy to assemble with pre-assembled screws included
- **Customer Service:** 24/7 customer support for any assistance you may need

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair, a perfect blend of style, comfort, and functionality. This chair is designed to provide ultimate relaxation and support during long gaming sessions or intense office work.

- **Ergonomics:** The chair features a retractable footrest, adjustable and detachable headrest, and an adjustable lumbar support pillow for optimal ergonomic support.
- **Suitability:** Perfect for gaming enthusiasts and office workers alike.
- **Assembly:** The chair is easy to assemble, with pre-assembled screws included for your convenience.

Product Listing:

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. This chair is perfect for gamers and office workers alike, providing ultimate comfort and support.

The chair comes in a stylish Purple color, made with premium soft PU leather that is both durable and comfortable. The hand-sewing diamond cross stitching adds a touch of elegance to the design.

One of the standout features of this chair is the lumbar pillow, which is USB powered and offers a massage function for relaxation during long gaming or work sessions. The chair also has a reclining function, with a range from 90° to 155°, allowing you to find the perfect position for maximum comfort.

The chair is designed for convenience and flexibility, with a 360° swivel feature and adjustable height. The rocking function allows for a gentle rocking motion up to 15°. The armrests are also adjustable, both vertically and horizontally, and are made with soft PU leather coating for added comfort.

The frame of the chair is made with integrated metal, ensuring durability and stability. The wheelbase is a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover type, which has been tested for 2000 miles of rolling.

Safety is a top priority with the thickened explosion-proof chassis and adjustable tilt mechanism. The tilt mechanism allows you to adjust the angle of the chair from 90° to 155°, and the safety lock ensures stability in your preferred position.

The chair is equipped with a gas cylinder that is SGS and BIFMA certificated, ensuring its durability and safety. It has a weight capacity of up to 330 lbs.

The seat cushion is made with high-density shaped foam, providing excellent support and comfort. It has a thickness of 4.3 inches and is designed to be both resilient and breathable.

The chair also offers ergonomic support, with a retractable footrest, a detachable and adjustable headrest, and an adjustable lumbar support pillow. These features help to reduce strain and promote a healthy sitting posture.

The Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is suitable for both gaming and office use, making it a versatile choice for any setting. It is easy to assemble, with pre-assembled screws and clear instructions included.

We pride ourselves on our excellent customer service, offering 24/7 support to ensure your satisfaction. Additionally, the chair comes with a one-month free return policy and a 5-year warranty for parts replacement.

Upgrade your gaming or office setup with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Experience comfort, style, and convenience like never before. Place your order today!
